amendment.description: Amendment sought to reintroduce competition to the contracting of government services and repeal the moratorium on A-76 procedures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 112-485 to reintroduce competition to the contracting of government services and repeal the moratorium on A-76 procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coffman (CO) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 211 (Roll no. 272).
